Uses of Package
neqsim.process.safety.risk

Packages that use neqsim.process.safety.risk
Package
Description
neqsim.process.safety.risk
Probabilistic risk analysis framework for process safety.
neqsim.process.safety.risk.dynamic
Dynamic risk simulation with transient modeling.
neqsim.process.safety.risk.portfolio
Multi-Asset Portfolio Risk Analysis Package.
neqsim.process.safety.risk.realtime
Real-time Risk Monitoring Package for Digital Twin Integration.
neqsim.process.safety.risk.sis
Safety Instrumented System (SIS) Integration Package.

    Represents a risk event for probabilistic safety analysis.
    RiskEvent.Builder
    Builder class for RiskEvent.
    RiskEvent.ConsequenceCategory
    Consequence severity categories per industry standards.
    RiskMatrix
    Risk Matrix for equipment failure analysis.
    RiskMatrix.ConsequenceCategory
    Consequence categories (1-5).
    RiskMatrix.ProbabilityCategory
    Probability categories (1-5).
    RiskMatrix.RiskAssessment
    Risk assessment for a single equipment.
    RiskMatrix.RiskLevel
    Risk level categories.

    Probabilistic risk model for process safety analysis.
    RiskModel.Builder
    Builder class for RiskModel.

    Container for probabilistic risk analysis results.

    Results for a single risk event.
    SensitivityResult
    Container for sensitivity analysis results.
